title: World Quests have ran out
body: So i have completed all world quests(including the world pass ones) and all i have left is my final quest called " A real challenger". I'm just curious if these are weekly generated world quests or did I complete all of them and have a glitch?

replies.body: More missions are coming each week. They should be popping up on the same day that the first set came out, so look for them tomorrow.
